text: The flag of Community of Madrid () is colored red and seven white stars in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the center. The ratio of the flag is 2:3. The stars symbolise the north, and since that is the direction on which all others are based, the stars represent Madrid as the seat of government for Spain.Madrid the Capital of Spain ==References== Madrid Comunity Madrid Comunity Category:Red and white flags
title: Flag of Madrid Comunity
